dashboard.subtitle: Choose a game and test your luck! Play with virtual money safely.

educationalBanner.title: üí° Remember: this is an educational project
educationalBanner.description: You are playing with virtual money. The goal is to show how quickly you can lose money in a casino.

blackjack.title: Blackjack
blackjack.rule1: Get as close to 21 without going over
blackjack.rule2: Face cards are worth 10, Aces are 1 or 11
blackjack.rule3: Dealer must hit on 16 or less, stand on 17 or more
blackjack.rule5: Double: Double your bet and get one more card

wheel.title: Wheel of Fortune
wheel.description: Spin the wheel and win a prize

roulette.noBets: Please place at least one bet!

slots.title: Slot Machine
slots.paytableInfo: Win by matching 3+ symbols on any of the 10 paylines
slots.info: 10 paylines ‚Ä¢ Match 3+ symbols to win ‚Ä¢ Higher bets = higher wins

work.title: Work
work.description: Earn virtual money by working for 3 minutes
work.educationalMessage: ‚ö†Ô∏è Remember: In real life, earning money requires much more time and effort. Gambling is entertainment with a high risk of losses.
work.step1: Click the "Work" button when your balance is low
work.step2: Wait for 3 minutes while the timer counts down
work.step3: Receive $500 after completing the work session
work.educationalText: This work system demonstrates the value of time and money. In real life, earning money takes significant time and effort. The casino games show how quickly you can lose what you worked hard to earn.

shop.sellWarning: You will receive 50% of the original price. This action cannot be undone.
shop.noMoneyDescription: You have run out of money
shop.noMoneyWithItems: You have no money to continue playing. You can sell your items to get money back!
shop.noMoneyNoItems: You have no money and no items. You need to work to earn money!
shop.sellItemsDescription: Get 50% of the original price back
shop.noMoneyTip: This is a simulation to show how quickly money can be lost to gambling. In real life, never gamble money you cannot afford to lose.

profile.noItemsDescription: Visit the shop to buy your first items!

equipment.noClothing: You are shyly wrapped in an advertising poster
equipment.noVehicle: You only travel on foot. Healthy!
equipment.noHome: You live in a cardboard box on the street

500.title: Internal Server Error
500.description: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.

503.title: Service Unavailable
503.description: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again in a few moments.

offline.message: You are currently offline. Some features may not be available.

casinoStats.title: Casino Statistics
casinoStats.subtitle: Global statistics of all Freezino players
casinoStats.educationalMessage: This statistics shows the reality of gambling: the house always wins. Most players lose money. Freezino is an educational project showing how quickly you can lose money in a casino. Never gamble with real money you cannot afford to lose!
